channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 陷入困境的中国恒大重返法庭接受清算听证会
item.description: A liquidation ruling of the developer would likely jolt fragile Chinese capital and property markets as low investor and consumer confidence remain a major drag on China's economy.翻译:由于投资者和消费者信心低迷仍然是中国经济的主要拖累，开发商的清算裁决可能会震动脆弱的中国资本和房地产市场。
item.author: Clare Jim

item.title: 早盘竞价：中国 PMI 和美联储决定将带来更多欢呼
item.description: The Fed's actions and Chair Jerome Powell's press conference will dominate proceedings.翻译:美联储的行动和主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的新闻发布会将主导会议进程。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 中美本周将就芬太尼前体化学品问题举行会议
item.description: The first joint meeting of a U.S.-China working group on fentanyl precursor chemicals will be held on Tuesday in Beijing, a senior U.S. official said on Sunday.翻译:一位美国高级官员周日表示，中美芬太尼前体化学品工作组首次联席会议将于周二在北京举行。
item.author: Kanishka Singh, Steve Holland

item.title: 中国允许菲律宾向争议岛礁派遣部队
item.description: The Chinese coastguard said it had made "temporary special arrangements" to allow the Philippines to deliver supplies to troops at a grounded World War Two-era vessel at a disputed reef.翻译:中国海警表示，已做出“临时特别安排”，允许菲律宾通过一艘停泊在争议礁石上的二战时期船只向部队运送物资。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国法案提出后，中国华大智造、GemPharmatech 为自己辩护
item.description: China's MGI Tech said on Sunday as an upstream equipment provider in the gene sequencing industry, its business does not involve data collection, after a proposed U.S. Biosecure Act included its name in the bill.翻译:中国华大智造周日表示，作为基因测序行业的上游设备提供商，在美国拟议的生物安全法案将其名字纳入法案后，其业务不涉及数据收集。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道，俄罗斯计划建设的通往中国的天然气管道面临施工延误
item.description: Mongolian Prime Minister L. Oyun-Erdene said construction of Russia's planned new Power of Siberia-2 gas pipeline to China, which was expected to start this year, may be delayed, the Financial Times reported on Sunday.翻译:据英国《金融时报》周日报道，蒙古总理奥云额尔登表示，俄罗斯计划于今年启动的通往中国的新西伯利亚力量2号天然气管道的建设可能会被推迟。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国证监会周一起暂停限制性股票借贷
item.description: China's securities regulator said on Sunday that it will fully suspend the lending of restricted shares effective from Monday, in policymakers' latest attempt to stabilise the country's stock markets following recent sharp falls.翻译:中国证券监管机构周日表示，将从周一起全面暂停限制性股票的出借，这是政策制定者在近期股市大幅下跌后稳定股市的最新举措。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国与泰国签署互免签证协议
item.description: Thailand and China agreed on Sunday to waive visa requirements for each other's nationals to facilitate travel and tourism between the two countries, hurt by COVID-19.翻译:泰国和中国周日同意免除对方国民的签证要求，以便利受新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 影响的两国之间的旅行和旅游业。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 印度远离俄罗斯武器，但仍将保持牢固关系
item.description: Russia supplied 65% of India's weapons purchases of more than $60 billion during the last two decades, but the Ukraine war hastened the impetus to diversify its weapons base.翻译:过去20年里，印度武器采购总额超过600亿美元，其中65%是由俄罗斯提供的，但乌克兰战争加速了印度武器基地多元化的动力。
item.author: Krishn Kaushik

item.title: 美国和中国高级官员在曼谷讨论台湾和伊朗问题
item.description: Top Chinese and U.S. officials held candid talks in Bangkok aimed at lowering tensions between the superpowers on Taiwan and other subjects, ahead of an expected springtime call between President Joe Biden and Chinese leader Xi Jinping.翻译:在总统乔·拜登和中国领导人习近平预计将于春季通话之前，中美高级官员在曼谷举行坦诚会谈，旨在缓解超级大国之间在台湾和其他问题上的紧张关系。
item.author: Chayut Setboonsarng, Liangping Gao, Trevor Hunnicutt

item.title: 中国称日本渔船非法进入钓鱼岛领海
item.description: The Chinese coast guard said a Japanese fishing vessel and several patrol boats illegally entered the territorial waters of the Diaoyu (Senkaku) islands, Chinese state broadcaster CCTV reported on Saturday night.翻译:据中国国家电视台中央电视台周六晚间报道，中国海警称一艘日本渔船和几艘巡逻艇非法进入钓鱼岛领海。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国称王毅与美国沙利文就处理问题进行了“坦诚、富有成果”的会谈
item.description: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi had "candid, substantive and fruitful strategic communication" with U.S. National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan, aimed at furthering a pledge of dialogue by their leaders, China's foreign ministry said on Saturday.翻译:中国外交部周六表示，中国外交部长王毅与美国国家安全顾问杰克·沙利文进行了“坦诚、实质性和富有成果的战略沟通”，旨在进一步落实两国领导人对话的承诺。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国的郑对萨巴伦卡的现实检查感到沮丧
item.description: China's Zheng Qinwen said she was bitterly disappointed not to have shown her best tennis as she was blown off the Rod Laver Arena court by Aryna Sabalenka in the Australian Open final on Saturday.翻译:中国选手郑沁文表示，她对没有展现自己最好的网球水平感到非常失望，因为她在周六的澳大利亚网球公开赛决赛中被萨巴伦卡从罗德·拉沃尔球场击落。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 萨巴伦卡在墨尔本获胜后称赞球队为她的方法增添了疯狂
item.description: Aryna Sabalenka won her second Australian Open title in emphatic style on Saturday and hailed her team of coaches for making life a little "crazy" off the court to ease the pressure that comes with elite level tennis.翻译:阿丽娜·萨巴伦卡周六以强势的方式赢得了她的第二个澳大利亚网球公开赛冠军，并赞扬她的教练团队让场外的生活变得有点“疯狂”，以缓解精英级别网球带来的压力。
item.author: Shrivathsa Sridhar

item.title: 萨巴伦卡力压郑智卫冕澳网冠军
item.description: Aryna Sabalenka produced an utterly dominant display to become the first woman in 11 years to retain the Australian Open title and send out a warning to her rivals with her second Grand Slam title on Saturday.翻译:阿丽娜·萨巴伦卡以绝对统治力的表现成为 11 年来第一位卫冕澳大利亚公开赛冠军的女性，并在周六以她的第二个大满贯冠军向她的对手发出了警告。
item.author: Shrivathsa Sridhar

item.title: 澳大利亚网球公开赛女单冠军阿琳娜·萨巴伦卡
item.description: Factbox on Belarus' Aryna Sabalenka, who beat China's Zheng Qinwen 6-3 6-2 in the Australian Open final on Saturday to win her second Grand Slam title.翻译:白俄罗斯选手阿丽娜·萨巴伦卡 (Aryna Sabalenka) 在周六的澳大利亚网球公开赛决赛中以 6-3 6-2 击败中国选手郑钦文，赢得了她的第二个大满贯冠军。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 萨巴伦卡击败中国选手郑重卫冕澳网冠军
item.description: Aryna Sabalenka beat China's Zheng Qinwen 6-3 6-2 to retain the Australian Open women's singles title on Saturday.翻译:周六，萨巴伦卡以6比3、6比2击败中国选手郑钦文，卫冕澳网女单冠军。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 广州率先全面放宽大房限购
item.description: China's major southern city of Guangzhou fully relaxed home purchase limits for some people on Saturday and said it would increase affordable housing supply, in a move to support the local property market.翻译:中国南方主要城市广州周六全面放宽部分人的购房限制，并表示将增加保障性住房供应，以支持当地房地产市场。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 波音737 MAX降落中国，结束积压订单进口冻结
item.description: China, which was the first country to ground MAX jets after two MAX 8 accidents in 2018 and 2019 that killed nearly 350 people.翻译:2018年和2019年发生两起造成近350人死亡的MAX 8事故后，中国成为第一个停飞MAX飞机的国家。
item.author: Lisa Barrington

item.title: 2023年中国工业利润下降2.3%
item.description: Profits at China's industrial firms fell 2.3% in 2023, their second straight yearly decline, due to sluggish demand at home and abroad, adding pressure on economic growth amid a deep property slump and deflationary risks.翻译:由于国内外需求低迷，2023年中国工业企业利润下降2.3%，连续第二年下降，房地产深度下滑和通货紧缩风险加大了经济增长压力。
item.author: Liangping Gao, Ryan Woo
